channel.title: Writing processes question
channel.description: does anybody else use auxy to come up with ideas and be creative, then play what you wrote on an instrument and put everything together? sorry this is oddly specific case in point, is your writing process similar to mine?

item.title: Writing processes question
item.dc:creator: MetricMusicDivision
item.description:
I am the reverse of your producing system

  1. Doing something
  2. B R A I N B L A S T
  3. Blip bloop I’m making a song out of this
  4. Add wubs (because why not)
  5. Rename the song to something that fits the song
  6. Render and upload the song
    6.1. Slap an “(Idea Capture Playlist)” in front of that title
  7. Make a cover for it because it looks good and professional
    7.1. Also, put the SC logo, the track and the producer name at the sweet spot of bottom left
  8. Boom it’s on SC and minutes later I get like spammed by bots (thanks, bots!)

Read full topic
